QuestData.Title: Twilight Captivity
QuestData.Description: I'd been scouting behind enemy lines for nearly a day when they caught me.$B$BThis attack on our frontlines is not what it appears, $n.$B$BI'll give you all the details, but first let's find a way to get me out of here.$B$BOnly the overseers carry keys to these cages.$B$BFrom what I recall, they're in the middle of the crater, in the thick of it.$B$BSee if you can get a key off of one of them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Twilight Overseer's Key at the Twilight Command Post in Hyjal.
QuestData.CompletionText: The key, $n. Did you get it?
QuestData.RewardText: I am thankful, $n. I will deliver my findings to our people.
